content: celebrate a world of color with laines du nord fashion mohair this yarn has some bulk to it which surprised me as i m used to working with mohair that s lace weight just one ball creates a fun striped beanie that s warm and very light weight keeping it simple is the key here so i ve written this beanie pattern that is beginner friendly there are 3 circumferences to choose from and length is fully adjustable even more options are available if you are confident to change needle sizes laines du nord fashion mohair - 1 ball us 9/ 5 5mm 16 circular needles us 10 5/ 6 5mm 16 circular needles and/or dpns or longer cord for magic loop method stitch marker \* tapestry needle \* scissors finished sizes width measured flat s - 16 m - 18 ¼ l/ xl - 20 ½
